body_content.explanation: A long-sighted person can only clearly see objects that are far away:
examples: Convex lenses help those who are long-sighted; concave lenses those who are short-sighted.
Longsighted people are unable to see close objects clearly.

body_content.explanation: having good judgment about what will happen in the future and the ability to make wise decisions based on this:
examples: His foreign policy was a combination of long-sighted achievements and short-sighted blunders.
They showed themselves to be broad-minded, mature, and long-sighted.
